summary: i sometimes wonder what muggle parents think about their kids lessons???? because like they send their 11 yo kid to this weird...
body: i sometimes wonder what muggle parents think about their kids lessons???? because like they send their 11 yo kid to this weird ass magic school that they didn’t even know existed and summer comes and they ask the kid what they learned this year and they just go “oh, ya know, a few murderous spells, some harming spells… oh, and there’s this guy that’s obsessed with one of the students and tries to kill him but it’s cool ig” and the parents are just like “????!!!!?!?!!???!!?”

summary: Harry Potter Characters as Taylor Swift lyrics
body:
Harry Potter Characters as Taylor Swift lyrics

Harry, in response to literally anything the poor boy does: something’s gone terribly wrong- ‘haunted’

Ron, trying to figure out Hermione: i wondered till i’m wide awake- ‘enchanted’

Hermione, to herself, about absolutely everything: look at you worrying so much about things you can’t change- ‘starlight’

Ginny, about Harry: it’s 2am and i’m cursing your name- ‘the way i loved you’

Draco, also about Harry because the boy’s a dumb fuck but he’s a hot dumb fuck who’s everyone’s crush: just so frustrating, intoxicating, complicated- ‘the way i loved you’

Luna, to Ginny candidly: you look like my next mistake- ‘blank space’

Molly, yelling furiously at the twins: you think that it’s funny when i’m mad, mad, mad- ‘stay stay stay’

Neville, blowing hair out of his face after getting a degree in badassery slaying Nagini, Voldemort’s last horcrux: i don’t regret it one bit cause he had it coming- ‘i did something bad’

James, severely crushing on a certain Lily Evans, reciting poetry for her: i’d kiss you as the lights went out, swaying as the room burned down, hold you as the water rushes in- ‘dancing with our hands tied’

Sirius, sighing at Remus’s perfect hair and his perfect smile and his perfect eyebrows and his perfect toenails: you’re so gorgeous, i can’t say anything to your face- ‘gorgeous’

-

alternatively,

imagine Sirius Black storming to Peter, Bad Blood music vid Tayloresque style after Peter betrayed the Potters, and screaming: baby, now we got bad blood

summary: When the internet doesn't work
title: When the internet doesn't work
body:
Ravenclaw: Goes to settings, then tries to fix the modem
Gryffindor: gets angry at the computer and follows ravenclaw to the modem 
Hufflepuff: plays the dinosaur game, gives up because work awaites
Slytherin: turns out slytherin turned off the modem to beat you at the dinosaur game

summary:
Pansy: You are so obliviously in love with Harry Potter, it’s disgusting. Draco: What? 

Draco: No.  

Draco: Absolutely not. ...
body:
Pansy: You are so obliviously in love with Harry Potter, it’s disgusting.

Draco: What?

Draco: No.

Draco: Absolutely not.

Draco: I mean… 

Draco: I wouldn’t say no to a kiss… just to be sure.

Draco: Maybe a date to see if we click emotionally…

Draco: A tasteful spring wedding…

summary: Drarry bond!fic rec!!!
title: Drarry bond!fic rec!!!
body:
For The Greater Good


Summary: When Harry and Draco discover they’ve been bonded to one another, neither one of them is prepared for the secrets they slowly begin to uncover.Together, they learn that they can’t escape their past, or the things that have been left hidden there, and that sometimes the only way to move forward is to look back.

My notes: This fic will give you all the feels - like, all of them. If the last paragraph doesn’t make your heart skip a beat and break in the most beautiful way, you’re probably dead inside. 

Excerpt: 

“It’s actually unbelievable that after all these years you’re still causing me so much trouble,” Malfoy says irritably. “How did you even let this happen? Aren’t you supposed to be a half decent Auror?”

“Me?” Harry asks incredulously. “How do we know this isn’t your fault! I was minding my own business, doing my job, and this thing hit me out of nowhere!”

“So, no then, to the half decent Auror question,” Malfoy drawls.

tags: harry potter and the goblet of fire
summary: I still remember the 1st time I watched Goblet of Fire and the score 'The story continues' played and I thought 'Wow, what a...
body:
I still remember the 1st time I watched Goblet of Fire and the score ‘The story continues’ played and I thought 'Wow, what a wonderful piece of music which perfectly summarizes the book. It is kinda depressing in a way but has an ample amount of spooky myterious feels in it, this movie is gonna be great’….

That’s it. That was the death of my expectations and I was just so calm .. like Dumbledore… 'AAAAAHHHHHHH’.

reblog.comment:

summary: I just realized that Charity Burbage was murdered early on in book seven, and you know the only professor who might have been...
body:
I just realized that Charity Burbage was murdered early on in book seven, and you know the only professor who might have been more likely to be murdered (by any Death Eater, not just Voldy who probably had a particular grudge against Trelawney, to be honest) than Charity Burbage? Filius Flitwick, the part goblin, that’s who. And rather than let him run back into a fight with a bunch of blood purist, racist Death Eaters (even though he’s a master duelist) Severus leaves Flitwick lying in his office when the Death Eaters infiltrate Hogwarts (whose arrival Severus hadn’t known about, since Draco wanted to do everything himself), and sends two more potential victims to take care of him, taking them also out of the line of fire.

“Lately, only those whom I could not save”

body:
James notices Lily bonding with Severus over books

James: Well I guess that’s your boyfriend now Iago, you backstabber!

Lily: I’m suprised you’ve read Othello.

James: What’s Othello?

James: I’m calling you the parrot from Aladdin.
